title: Blocking China from US AI chips 'hurts us more' - Nvidia CEO
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Tuesday warned that the United States must allow the sale of US-made AI chips in China in order to ensure Silicon Valley companies remain a global powerhouse in providing artificial intelligence.
content:
WASHINGTON, D.C. — Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Tuesday warned that the United States must allow the sale of US-made AI chips in China in order to ensure Silicon Valley companies remain a global powerhouse in providing artificial intelligence.

title: Uber eyes fleet of 100,000 Nvidia
description: Uber Technologies Inc. is setting a goal to eventually have a fleet of 100,000 autonomous vehicles powered by Nvidia Corp. technology, an ambitious move that could help bring down the cost of offering hailable robotaxis to consumers. The companies expect the expansion to start in 2027, Nvidia said in a statement Tuesday. The announcement builds on an earlier partnership the two companies struck in January, with Uber agreeing to offer some of its driving data to help improve Nvidia’s artificial intelligence models and chip technology that carmakers can use to develop autonomous vehicles.
content:
Uber eyes fleet of 100,000 Nvidia-based robotaxis beginning 2027
Stellantis will work with Foxconn on hardware and systems integration, the carmaker said in a separate statement. Start of production is targeted for 2028, with initial operations with ... [3278 chars]

title: Asia stocks rise on AI optimism, investors gird for Fed, tech earnings
description: SINGAPORE: Asian shares got a lift from Wall Street on Wednesday thanks to a fresh wave of optimism over artificial intelligence, as investors braced for a busy day headlined by the Federal Reserve's decision and earnings from technology heavyweights.

title: Asian Market Surge: AI Optimism and Federal Reserve Anticipations
description: Asian markets surged as Wall Street's optimism around artificial intelligence soared. Nvidia's $500 billion AI chip orders and Microsoft’s stake in OpenAI boosted stocks. Investors also keenly await the Federal Reserve's rate decision, expecting a dovish turn. Commodities like oil and gold showed varied movements in response to global developments.
content: Asian shares experienced an upswing on Wednesday, driven by positive sentiments from Wall Street amidst a new wave of artificial intelligence-related optimism. As technology giants like Nvidia and Microsoft showcased their strength, investors braced ... [701 chars]

title: Nvidia To Take $1 Billion Nokia Stake, Supply Network AI Chips
description: Nvidia Corp. is taking a $1 billion equity stake in Nokia Oyj and plans to supply the telecom company with artificial-intelligence powered computers for wireless networks. Nokia shares jumped the most in more than a decade.
content:
Nvidia Corp. is taking a $1 billion equity stake in Nokia Oyj and plans to supply the telecom company with artificial-intelligence powered computers for wireless networks. Nokia shares jumped the most in more than a decade.

title: Trump Says He Expects to Lower China’s Fentanyl Tariff in Xi Deal
description: Donald Trump said he expects to lower tariffs the US has imposed on Chinese goods over the fentanyl crisis and speak with China’s Xi Jinping about Nvidia Corp.’s flagship Blackwell artificial intelligence chip, as leaders of the world’s biggest economies seek to ease tensions in a meeting on Thursday.
